description: Discover WebSim projects, creators, and trending content with powerful search and filters. Inspect project details, screenshots, comments, and engagement stats to guide research and curation. Track user profiles and activity to surface influential creators and relevant assets.

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a WebSim project by its ID. Perfect for 'Show me project [ID]' or 'Tell me about project [ID]' questions.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WebSim project

tools.name: get_project_by_slug
tools.description: Get detailed information about a WebSim project using the owner's username and project slug. Perfect for 'Show me @username/project-slug' or 'Tell me about [username]/[slug]' questions.

user.description: The username of the project owner

tools.name: list_trending_projects
tools.description: Get a list of trending WebSim projects. Perfect for 'Show me trending projects' or 'What are the popular projects?' questions. Supports pagination and filtering by time range.

limit.description: Number of projects to return (1-100, default: 20)

offset.description: Number of projects to skip for pagination (default: 0)

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get detailed information about a WebSim user profile. Perfect for 'Tell me about user [username]' or 'Show me @[username]' questions.

username.description: The username of the WebSim user

tools.name: get_user_projects
tools.description: Get a list of projects created by a specific WebSim user. Perfect for 'Show me [username]'s projects' or 'List projects by @[username]' questions. Supports sorting and pagination.

limit.description: Number of projects to return (1-100, default: 20)

offset.description: Number of projects to skip for pagination (default: 0)

username.description: The username of the WebSim user

tools.name: get_user_stats
tools.description: Get detailed statistics for a WebSim user. Perfect for 'Show me [username]'s statistics' or 'What are @[username]'s stats?' questions.

username.description: The username of the WebSim user

tools.name: search_projects
tools.description: Search for WebSim projects by keywords, tags, or descriptions. Perfect for 'Find projects about [topic]' or 'Search for [keyword] projects' questions. Supports sorting and pagination.

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-100, default: 20)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

tools.name: search_assets
tools.description: Search for assets (images, files, resources) in WebSim projects. Perfect for 'Find assets about [topic]' or 'Search for [keyword] files' questions. Supports MIME type filtering.

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-100, default: 20)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

tools.name: list_project_comments
tools.description: Get comments on a WebSim project. Perfect for 'Show me comments on project [ID]' or 'What are people saying about [project]?' questions. Supports pagination and different sorting orders.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WebSim project

last.description: Number of last comments to return

after.description: Get comments after this comment ID

first.description: Number of first comments to return

before.description: Get comments before this comment ID

tools.name: get_related_keywords
tools.description: Get related keywords and search suggestions based on a query. Perfect for 'What keywords are related to [topic]?' or 'Show me suggestions for [keyword]' questions. Helps discover related content and trending topics.

limit.description: Number of related keywords to return (1-50, default: 10)

query.description: The search query to get related keywords for

tools.name: list_project_screenshots
tools.description: Get screenshots of a WebSim project revision. Perfect for 'Show me screenshots of project [ID]' or 'What does [project] version [X] look like?' questions.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WebSim project
